item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 10, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Making Sense of Lambda Calculus 0: Abstration, Reduction, Substitution? (18 points | 2 comments)
2. Dobble (The Mathematics Of) (2018) (30 points | 4 comments)
3. The Principles of Mr. Harrison's Time-Keeper (25 points | 5 comments)
4. Audio Decomposition – open-source seperation of music to constituent instruments (158 points | 39 comments)
5. Mind-Bending Soviet Era Oil Rig City on the Caspian Sea (96 points | 30 comments)
6. OpenCoder: Open Cookbook for Top-Tier Code Large Language Models (517 points | 62 comments)
7. IronCalc – Open-Source Spreadsheet Engine (549 points | 161 comments)
8. Linux Asceticism (33 points | 20 comments)
9. 19th Century Map Shows a Fictional Country Created by a Con Man (24 points | 8 comments)
10. NYC Subway Station Layouts (248 points | 74 comments)
11. Shaderblocks: Block-based image editing (103 points | 23 comments)
12. Show HN: Jaws – a JavaScript to WASM ahead-of-time compiler (234 points | 88 comments)
13. Show HN: Visprex – Open-source, in-browser data visualisation tool for CSV files (155 points | 22 comments)
14. Mergiraf: a syntax-aware merge driver for Git (382 points | 77 comments)
15. GenMC: Model checking for concurrent C programs (38 points | 1 comment)
16. AI-Time Travel-Street View (7 points | 2 comments)
17. FrontierMath: A benchmark for evaluating advanced mathematical reasoning in AI (138 points | 68 comments)
18. When machine learning tells the wrong story (203 points | 17 comments)
19. A skeleton made from the bones of at least eight people thousands of years apart (86 points | 28 comments)
20. Show HN: HTML-to-Markdown – convert entire websites to Markdown with Golang/CLI (312 points | 47 comments)
21. Hard Cases for a Handle Theory (28 points | 2 comments)
22. Grim Fandango (260 points | 87 comments)
23. Physical Intelligence's first generalist policy AI can finally do your laundry (161 points | 128 comments)
24. Early Cascade Injection: From Windows process creation to stealthy injection (110 points | 11 comments)
25. Texture-Less Text Rendering (200 points | 49 comments)
26. Zig's (.{}){} Syntax (213 points | 136 comments)
27. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (206 points | 83 comments)
28. Notes on Guyana (166 points | 118 comments)
29. Somebody moved the UK's oldest satellite in the mid 1970s, but no one knows who (146 points | 78 comments)
30. Since the '60s, Ford has stored cars underground in a Kansas City cave (192 points | 78 comments)
